xep.header:
XMPP Client Compliance 2009 This document defines XMPP client compliance levels for 2009. &LEGALNOTICE; 0242 Obsolete Standards Track Standards

1.0 2008-09-08 psa
Per a vote of the XMPP Council, advanced specification to Draft.
0.2 2008-06-18 psa
Changed compliance level names, updated required support per Council discussion.
0.1 2008-05-28 psa
Initial published version, incorporating Council feedback.
0.0.1 2008-05-27 psa
First draft, copied and modified from XEP-0211.

section1.p: The &XSF; defines protocol suites for the purpose of compliance testing and software certification. This document specifies the 2009 compliance levels for XMPP clients. Support for the listed specifications is REQUIRED for compliance purposes.
The XMPP Core Client 2009 certification level is defined as follows:
The XMPP Advanced Client 2009 certification level is defined as follows:

ul.li: &xep0045; (Entity Use Cases and Occupant Use Cases)

section1.p: Some of the protocol specifications referenced herein have their own dependencies; developers must refer to the relevant specifications for further information.
Developers are advised to refer to &xep0178; regarding proper implementation of the SASL EXTERNAL mechanism in XMPP.
This document introduces no additional security considerations above and beyond those defined in the documents on which it depends.
This document requires no interaction with &IANA;.
This document requires no interaction with the ®ISTRAR;.
